doc:
Mark Boone Junior https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mark_Boone_Junior 0 Mark Boone Junior (born Mark Heidrich; March 17, 1955) is an American actor, best known for his roles as Bobby Munson in FX's Sons of Anarchy (2008–2014) and in Christopher Nolan's Memento (2000) and Batman Begins (2005). Mark_Boone_Junior ( born Mark_Heidrich ; March_17_,_1955 ) is an_American_actor , best_known for his_roles as Bobby_Munson in FX 's_Sons of Anarchy ( 2008 – 2014 ) and in Christopher_Nolan 's_Memento ( 2000 ) and Batman Begins ( 2005 ) .
